joint_name.description: Property.  This message contains information about limits of a particular joint (or control dimension)

has_position_limits.description: Property.  true if the joint has position limits

min_position.description: Property.  min and max position limits

has_velocity_limits.description: Property.  true if joint has velocity limits

has_acceleration_limits.description: Property.  min_velocity is assumed to be -max_velocity  true if joint has acceleration limits
